text: Flávio Aurélio dos Santos Soares (Espiga) is a Brazilian professional basketball player, who plays in the Novo Basquete Brasil league. ==Previous Teams== *Vasco da Gama *Report Suzano *Report Mogi *Tijuca Tênis Clube *Corinthians/RS *Jequiá I.C. *Fluminense *Unit/Uberlândia *Minas Tênis Clube ==Ciser/Araldite/Univille== Espiga (center) being presented before a 2010 playoff game Espiga was one of the founding players of the Joinville team, after the team lost its sponsor and was re-created a couple of years later. He is the oldest player on the squad, but is very loved by the local crowd and gets many minutes off the bench.
